short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multiples a selected number by a specified multiplier, allowing quick calculations directly within your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MarkN'Multiply is a cutting-edge browser extension designed to significantly boost productivity by enabling users to perform quick multiplications directly within their browser. This utility is especially handy for those in need of fast calculations without the interruption of switching to a different calculator tool. Developed on the latest Chrome extension framework, manifest version 3, it ensures compatibility and performance. The extension allows for the multiplication of selected numbers by a user-specified multiplier, seamlessly integrating this functionality across all webpages thanks to its comprehensive content script permissions. With an intuitive pop-up interface, users can effortlessly input their desired multiplier and customize the display settings for the multiplication results, such as duration and screen position, ensuring optimal visibility and convenience.
